attributes.action: Remove the royal titles from Harry and Meghan
attributes.additional_details: They have lost the right to represent the royal family and the people of Britain and the commonwealth with their constant whinging and complaining
attributes.background: Take their royal titles from them

rejection.details: We can't publish petitions about honours and appointments, including asking for people to be given or have titles removed. In any case, the use of Royal titles are a matter for Her Majesty the Queen and not the Government or Parliament.
